name: Dead Island: Ryder White
description:
Dead Island: Ryder White is an action game developed by Techland. It came out on 01-02-2012. It was published by Deep Silver. Dead Island: Ryder White has a Metascore of 44, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Dead Island: Ryder White is available on Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and PC.
